title: Cabinet approves 10-year PM term limit
desc: Law and institutional reform minister Azalina Othman Said says the tenure is in line with mature democratic practices internationally.

title: Tragedies befall Masvingo: Double murder, missing boy found dead and Tugwi
desc: THE Zimbabwe Republic Police (ZRP) has announced a series of tragic incidents in Masvingo, including the arrest of a 29-year-old man for allegedly killing two minors in Zaka, the death of a four-year-old learner in Chiredzi, and a drowning incident at Tugwi-Mukosi Dam. Police spokesperson Commissioner Paul Nyathi confirmed the arrest of Obedience Makonye (29), […]

title: Adani agrees to receive legal notice in U.S. SEC civil fraud case, to respond in 90 days
desc: Gautam and Sagar Adani agree to accept legal notice from the U.S. SEC in a civil fraud case, responding in 90 days.

title: Some 'impassable' roads closed in Wexford over flooding
desc: Wexford County Council said multiple roads were closed across the county due to flooding following bad weather conditions.

title: What’s being said nationally after Michigan basketball beats MSU in top-10 matchup
desc: The Wolverines downed the Spartans 83-71 Friday for their first win at Breslin Center since 2018.

title: Retired Air Force officer shot by unidentified assailants at restaurant in Lucknow shopping complex
desc: LUCKNOW: A retired Indian Air Force officer was critically injured after being shot by unidentified assailants at his restaurant in the Sushant Golf C.

title: Radio station One Fm 91.3 criticised for jumping on PLB scandal bandwagon with parody skit
desc: ONE FM 91.3 recreated the viral PLB cheating exposé in a parody video, but netizens criticised the radio station for being unprofessional.

title: Judge bars prosecutors from seeking death penalty for Luigi Mangione
desc: The move foils the Trump administration’s bid to see him executed for what it called a “premeditated, cold-blooded assassination that shocked America”.
